segments.text: We have made some adjustment on the prices . And this is renewed price list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for allowing us 3 % reduction , but still we find your price is on the high side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is our rock-bottom price , and we can't make any further reduction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If so , we find it difficult for us to go on with our talks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what â€™ s your counter-offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are sincere to make business with you , but the difference between your counter-offer and our price is too great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So are we . Our counter-offer is in line with the world market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about meeting each other half-way in order to conclude the business ?
segments.speaker: S1
